thread.section_title: Hotel delle Nazioni - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Second visit to this hotel.
thread.title_full: Second visit to this hotel. - Review of Hotel delle Nazioni, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: curbimus
title: Second visit to this hotel.
text:
This hotels location cannot be beat. Steps from the Trevi.... a taxi stand right outside... and a restaurant /bar inside.
The hotel is very affordable. Only thing I must say negative is that rooms are not consistent. Last year our regular room had a huge bathroom and larger bedroom. This year my brothers room had a huge bathtub and shower and a foyer, yet ours had no foyer and the worlds tiniest shower with no tub.
Good breakfast. Friendly and helpful staff.
